thumb.title: 【TAS】 SUPER STREET FIGHTER 2X - New Legacy (Dee Jay, Type SSF2)
thumb.description: スパ2X・新の遺産 SUPER STREET FIGHTER 2XNew Legacy(Hack-Rom, 2020)Character - Dee Jay (Type SSF2)難易度・★★★★★★★★ (Lvl.8, Hardest)1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost(Tool-Assisted Gameplay)======New Legacy is a Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo hack-rom by Born2SPD. First release of the hack-rom was five years ago (February 5, 2020).https://newlegacy.fr/======00:00 Game/Difficulty Settings00:08 Character Select (Dee Jay)00:12 Battle 01 - Chun Li01:11 Battle 02 - Guile02:01 Battle 03 - Cammy White02:47 Battle 04 - Edmond Honda03:48 Battle 05 - Dhalsim04:31 Battle 06 - Ken Masters05:14 Battle 07 - Zangief06:04 Battle 08 - Dee Jay (Type SSF2X)06:54 Battle 09 - M.Bison (Boxer)07:37 Battle 10 - Balrog (Claw)08:27 Battle 11 - Sagat09:19 Battle 12 - Gouki (Akuma)10:00 Ending & Credits12:17 Thanks for Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
thumb.last_res_body: おお綺麗 いいダメージ Xを色々調整したや... 尿～ バイソンがジャイ... こうして見るとス... 背景のモブにボブ... マシンガン全部空... 適当ぬ...
